channel.title: CVE Feed for OctopusDeploy -- OctopusDSC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OctopusDeploy -- OctopusDSC

item.title: CVE-2021-21270|2024-08-03T18:09:14.987Z -- octopusdeploy -- octopusdsc
item.description: OctopusDSC is a PowerShell module with DSC resources that can be used to install and configure an Octopus Deploy Server and Tentacle agent. In OctopusDSC version 4.0.977 and earlier a customer API key used to connect to Octopus Server is exposed via logging in plaintext. This vulnerability is patched in version 4.0.1002.
